title: Human Reliability Analysis for Drilling
content: Human Reliability Analysis (HRA) identifies where human actions are critical to preventing or mitigating Major Accident Hazards (MAH). It quantifies the likelihood of human failure and identifies Performance Influencing Factors (PIFs). HRA should be integrated into safety case risk assessments for safety-critical tasks.
openQuestions: Has HRA been performed for your rig's safety-critical tasks?
What tasks on your rig have the highest consequence if performed incorrectly?
